author.name: Marek Marecki
message:
The problem was that the old `.import:` directive.

It worked on files instead of modules. This meant that what was
specified as the target of an import were explicit file paths instead of
abstract module names.

When the proper support is implemented the linker will read module
names, translate them into file paths (internally), and then use the
automatically generated file paths to look for module files.

Simple, elegant, and forcing the specification of a module system.
